data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at De Kuip.
At De Kuip, Rami Hajal has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Goal! Bryan Linssen heads Feyenoord into a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 49, Tyrell Malacia with an assist there.
Feyenoord take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Bryan Linssen.
That's a fine assist from Steven Berghuis.
In the minute 63, Arjen Van Der Heide is replacing Oliver Batista Meier for the away team.
Heerenveen make their second substitution with Ulysses Llanez Jr. Replacing Rami Hajal.
The away team have replaced Benjamin Nygren with Hamdi Akujobi. This is the third substitution made today by Johnny Jansen.
In the minute 78, Dylan Vente is replacing Luciano Narsingh for Feyenoord at De Kuip.
The home team replace Leroy Fer with Jordy Wehrmann.
Jochem Kamphuis blows to end the match. The final score is 3-0.
Great finish from Bryan Linssen to give Feyenoord a 3-0 lead.
